full_summary:
=====================================

### Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat: Staffing Consultant RFP

#### Vendor Information

The Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat (TBS) is seeking a Staffing Consultant to provide human resources management services as part of the bureau staffing processes. This Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued under the Flexible Labour Market Services (FLMS) contract, Solicitation Number 24062-23-648.

#### Key Details

| **Category** | **Description** |
|--------------|-----------------|
| **RFx Status** | Expired          |
| **Solicitation Number** | 24062-23-648     |
| **Tender Closing Date** | 2023-12-12 14:00:00 |
| **Expected Contract Start Date** | 2024-02-01         |
| **Expected Contract End Date** | 2026-03-31          |

#### Contract Requirements

The successful bidder will provide staffing consultant services to assist the TBS in managing its human resources for the purposes of filling positions within the bureau. The consultant must be able to advise on matters related to personnel management, recruitment, and retention strategies.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The eligibility of proposals will be determined based on a combined rating of technical merit and price. The final score will be evaluated based on the bidder's technical proposal, the proposed methodology, and the price.

#### Bidding Instructions

To access the full RFP documentation, including the RFP document and any amendments, please visit [Canada Buys Website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca). The available documents are listed below:

*   [English RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25962/npp-english-23-648.pdf)
*   [French RFP Document](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25962/23-648-npp-french.pdf)

#### Contact Information

For any questions regarding this RFP, please contact Dawn Dormer, Treasury Board of Canada Secretariat, Dawn.Dormer@tbs-sct.gc.ca, 343-542-8102.
